00015     return lhs += rhs;

00017   
00018  public:
00019   int r;

00027 const static Position NORTH(-1, 0);
00028 const static Position NORTH_EAST(-1, 1);
00029 const static Position EAST(0, 1);
00030 const static Position SOUTH_EAST(1, 1);
00031 const static Position SOUTH(1, 0);
00032 const static Position SOUTH_WEST(1, -1);
00033 const static Position WEST(0, -1);
00034 const static Position NORTH_WEST(-1, -1);

00036 static const Position cnarr[] = {NORTH, NORTH_EAST, EAST, SOUTH_EAST, SOUTH, SOUTH_WEST, WEST, NORTH_WEST};
00037 static const Position fnarr[] = {NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST};
00038 static const vector<Position> conwayNeighbors(cnarr, cnarr + 8);
00039 static const vector<Position> fredkinNeighbors(fnarr, fnarr + 4);

00154 template <typename T>
00155 Life<T>::Life(istream& in) {
00156   generation = 0;
00157   population = 0;
00158   int rows;
00159   int cols;
00160   in >> rows;
00161   in >> cols >> ws;
00162   
00163   for(int r = 0; r < rows; r++) {
00164     grid.push_back(vector<T>());
00165     for(int c = 0; c < cols; c++) {
00166       char cell;
00167       in >> cell;
00168       grid[r].push_back(T(cell));
00169       if(grid[r][c])
00170         population++;
00171     }
00172     if(in)
00173       in >> ws;
00174   }
00175 }
00176 
00180 template <typename T>
00181 void Life<T>::takeTurn() {
00182   population = 0;
00183   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < grid.size(); i++)
00184     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < grid[0].size(); j++) {
00185       current.r = i;
00186       current.c = j;
00187       countNeighbors(grid[i][j]);
00188     }
00189   
00190   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < grid.size(); i++) {
00191     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < grid[0].size(); j++) {
00192       grid[i][j].turn();
00193       if (grid[i][j])
00194         population++;
00195     }
00196   }
00197   generation++;
00198 }
00199 
00204 template <typename T>
00205 void Life<T>::simulate(int numTurns) {
00206   while(numTurns-- > 0)
00207     takeTurn();
00208 }
00209 
00214 template <typename T>
00215 void Life<T>::print(ostream& out) {
00216   out << "Generation = " << generation << ", Population = " << population << "." << endl;
00217   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < grid.size(); i++) {
00218     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < grid[0].size(); j++)
00219       out << grid[i][j].name();
00220     out << endl;
00221   }
00222   out << endl;
00223 }
00224 
00229 template <typename T>
00230 void Life<T>::countNeighbors(T& cell) {
00231   vector<Position> adjacent = cell.neighbors();
00232   int numNeighbors = 0;
00233   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < adjacent.size(); i++) {
00234     numNeighbors += isAlive(adjacent[i]);
00235   }
00236   cell.setNeighbors(numNeighbors);
00237 }
00238 
00244 template <typename T>
00245 bool Life<T>::isAlive(Position adj) {
00246   Position p = current + adj;
00247   if(p.r < 0 || p.r >= (int)grid.size() || p.c < 0 || p.c >= (int)grid[0].size()) 
00248     return false;
00249   return grid[p.r][p.c];
00250 }

00260 void AbstractCell::setNeighbors(int n) {
00261   if(n < 0 || n > 8) throw(invalid_argument("n must be between 0 and 8, inclusive"));
00262   numNeighbors = n;
00263 }

00289 Cell::Cell(char c){
00290   if(c == '.'|| c == '*')
00291     ptr = new ConwayCell(c);
00292   else
00293     ptr = new FredkinCell(c);
00294 }

00300 Cell::Cell(const Cell& other) {

00302     ptr = 0;
00303   else

00326 void Cell::turn() {
00327   ptr->turn();
00328   if(*ptr == 2 && *ptr) {
00329     delete ptr;
00330     ptr = new ConwayCell('*');  
00331   }
00332 }

00382 ConwayCell::ConwayCell(char c) {
00383   if (c == '.')
00384     alive = false;
00385   else if (c == '*')
00386     alive = true;
00387 }
00388 
00392 void ConwayCell::turn() {
00393   if (numNeighbors == 3)
00394     alive = true;
00395   else if (numNeighbors < 2 || numNeighbors > 3)
00396     alive = false;
00397   else
00398     alive = alive; //do nothing
00399 }

00413 char ConwayCell::name() const {
00414   if(alive)
00415     return '*';
00416   return '.';
00417 }

00428 // ------------
00429 // Fredkin Cell
00430 // ------------
00431 
00436 FredkinCell::FredkinCell(char c) {
00437   age = 0;
00438   if (c == '-')
00439     alive = false;
00440   else {
00441     alive = true;
00442     age = c & 0xF;
00443   } 
00444 }
00445 
00449 void FredkinCell::turn() {
00450   if (numNeighbors % 2 == 1) {
00451     if(alive)
00452       age++;
00453     alive = true;
00454   }
00455   else
00456     alive = false;
00457 }
00458 
00463 const vector<Position>& FredkinCell::neighbors() const {
00464   return fredkinNeighbors;
00465 }
00466 
00471 char FredkinCell::name() const {
00472   if(!alive)
00473     return '-';
00474   if(age > 9)
00475     return '+';
00476   return (char) (age + 0x30);
00477 }

00484   return age;
